page.title: 10ILKESTON DIALECT
page.content: Here is a simple guide to{Ilkeston} speech: {Ilson}..........Ilkeston {Ey up!}.........Hello{ {scrait}.........cry {mardy}..........sulky {owd}............old {bodge}..........mess up {borrer}.........lend {nowt}...........nothing {'e wor}.........he was {allus}..........always {In't they!}.....Aren't there! {Aw raight?}.....Are you well? {aldees}.........holidays {ovver theer}....over there {haif}...........half {lozzin abairt}..lazing around {ovverlayd}......got up late {sairnd}.........first rate {wot's gooin off}what is happening?
